mapper.insert: insert into oomall_payment(actual_price,pay_channel, is_successful, begin_time, end_time, order_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_deleted,pay_sn) values (#{actualPrice}, #{payChannel},0, #{beginTime}, date_add(#{beginTime}, interval 30 minute), #{orderId}, now(), now(), 0,#{paySn})
mapper.select: select id, actual_price, pay_channel, pay_time, pay_sn, begin_time, end_time, order_id, is_deleted as beDeleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified from oomall_payment where id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0

select id, actual_price, pay_channel, pay_time, pay_sn, begin_time, end_time, order_id, is_deleted as beDeleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified from oomall_payment where pay_sn = #{paySn} and is_deleted = 0

select id, actual_price, pay_channel, pay_time, pay_sn, begin_time, end_time, order_id, is_deleted as beDeleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified from oomall_payment where order_id = #{orderId} and actual_price > 0 and is_deleted = 0
select order_id from oomall_payment where id = #{id} and actual_price > 0 and is_deleted = 0
